short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension supports additional upload mechanisms for specific blood glucose meters, expanding support for compatible devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tidepool Web Uploader provides direct upload support for over 85 supported insulin pumps, continuous glucose monitors, and blood glucose meters. This extension supports additional upload mechanisms for specific blood glucose meters, expanding support for compatible devices.
